desc: Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds, but cannot reduce respawn time to less than 1 second. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
attrib:
+ 475 Health
+ 425 Mana
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
